channel.title: RuneScapes new update
channel.description:
Well you guys the new updates are weird, the first login loading screen is different and now they have task~ I guess its a update for the adventures log or whatever that's called, but when I logged in I got a pop up ingame saying "task completed". Kind of like the stuff on WoW you see, I will get a screen of it in a sec from my other bot.
[IMG]http://i53.tinypic.com/vwzrpv.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i54.tinypic.com/2609b93.png[/img]
[img]http://i56.tinypic.com/2aan7v6.png[/img]

item.title: RuneScapes new update
item.dc:creator: @whattehp406 whattehp406
item.description:
@whattehp406 wrote:

[quote=“jmood128, post:35, topic:370147”][quote author=whattehp406 link=topic=466265.msg3412214#msg3412214 date=1290787413]

They have already been hacked, its called Powerbot ;D Nah, in all seriousness, they pay thousands of dollars for protection against hackers and such, we wouldn’ t stand a chance.

Wells lets say there are 300 people on moparscape who are really smart. And we have 100 people who are really rich. We could but super dedi servers the size of runescapes and just ddos the fuck out of them and then demand money or lots of free candy! Yumms

You demolished your idea right there.
[/quote]well there are accualy smart people here, but just not 300

I think your wrong… I think they’re more then 300 people who are smart. This is the internet you don’t have to show any intelligence if you don’t feel like it.[/quote]yes that’s indeed correct
but the other prob is they are smart enough to know that if u ddos fagex they might sew them
if any of those server crashes jagex is goinng to let you pay alot

Read full topic

item.title: RuneScapes new update
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

I like the new login screen, the client loads immediately for me now.

I like doing the new tasks, 118/120 for Lumridge. However, I find the interface somewhat confusing >.< I had 170 tasks total right when I logged in, so that was an easy 300k for doing nothing

Read full topic

item.description:

I have stopped checking the site for updates, they are always disappointing. Fagex lives up to their name more and more every month.

Read full topic

item.title: RuneScapes new update
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

I’m not sure if you get any coins from completing Achievement Diary tasks (It doesn’t list it on the rewards tab for them, maybe they’re hidden?). Looking over the Lumbridge/Draynor ones (regular tasks), I’m getting about 2,560 coins per completion, or “an amount of money based on total Tasks completed and (random item).”

There’s probably more info on this on the Knowledge Base article, but I don’t feel like looking it up.

P.S. There is a checkbox you can click to disable the pop-ups when completing a task, and for those lazy enough not to read, you can talk to Ned in Draynor or Explorer Jack in Lumbridge to claim the rewards.

Read full topic

item.description:

Cause I need ways to get money, other than mining/GOP.[/quote]I don’t think I got anything from it.

Rich said he got 700k from 360 done.~

item.title: RuneScapes new update
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

They added that to alert an hour earlier as everyone kept complaining about getting kicked out of dungeoneering early and getting no experience because of the 10 minute timer.

The new login screen is good, tasks are decent (though the interface is pretty irritating at times). I’ve only completed 360 tasks and got a 700k or so reward.

Read full topic

item.description:

Yeahhhhh new way for updates and stuff!!
